title.narrative: Heilongjiang Cold Weather Smart Public Transportation System

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to upgrade the quality and efficiency of public transport services in selected public transport corridors of the project cities.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section 1, D, Paragraph 1 (a) | Description :By no later than September 30, 2016,Harbin Municipality shall have entered into agreements with Harbin Bus Company and Harbin TramCompany, under terms and conditionsacceptable to the Bank, inter alia transferring the buses and setting out performance standardsfor their operation. | Due Date:30-Sep-2016

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section 1, D, Paragraph 1 (b) | Description :By no later than September 30, 2016,Mudanjiang Municipality shall have entered into agreement with Mudanjiang Bus Company, under terms and conditions acceptable to theBank, inter alia, leasing the buses and setting out performance standards for their operation. | Due Date :30-Sep-2016

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section 1, D, Paragraph 1 (c) | Description :Harbin and Mudanjiang municipalitiesshall have undertaken a study, under terms of reference acceptable to the Bank, to review the regulation, financing andsubsidization arrangements of its public transport sector, with a view to better integrating the private sector and to establishingintegrated service standards, as well as adequate operational responsibilities and public support mechanisms. | Due Date:30-Sep-2016

title.narrative: Reduced energy consumption by buses along the targeted corridors (Mudanjiang)
Reduced energy consumption by buses along the targeted corridors (Harbin)
At least one urban transport related policy/plan/strategy issued by each city (Harbin and Mudanjiang)
Increased annual bus ridership volume along the targeted corridors. (Million/year) (Mudanjiang)
Increased annual bus ridership volume along the targeted corridors. (Million/year) (Harbin)
Number of passenger hubs and depots constructed. (Mudanjiang)
Number of passenger hubs and depots constructed. (Harbin)
Number of intersections upgraded with traffic signals with bus priority function and pedestrian crossings installed. (Harbin)
Number of emergency rescue equipment and specialized road maintenance equipment procured. (Harbin)
Number of intersections upgraded with traffic signals with bus priority function and pedestrian crossings installed. (Mudanjiang)
Total length of public transport corridors developed. (Mudanjiang)
% completion of the agreed completed measures in the Performance and Lease Agreements (Harbin)
Total length of public transport corridors developed. (Harbin)
% completion of the agreed completed measures in the Performance and Lease Agreements (Mudanjiang)
Reduced fatalities and major injuries along the targeted corridors (Mudanjiang)
Increase in public transport service satisfaction along the targeted corridors (Harbin City)
Increased share of buses arriving on schedule. (Harbin)
Reduced fatalities and major injuries along the targeted corridors (Harbin)
Increase in public transport service satisfaction along the targeted corridors (Mudanjiang)
Increased share of buses arriving on schedule (Mudanjiang).
